paragraphs.content: I grew up in Gujarat, where I attended an immersion school that taught exclusively in Gujarati. I obtained my bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from LDCE (GTU) in Ahmedabad and have accumulated over 3 years of professional experience in robotics and end to end software development.

Recently, I completed my Master's degree in Computer Science from UT Arlington. My primary interest lies in the field of unmanned vehicle systems and their diverse applications, specifically in the areas of motion prediction and perception. I thoroughly enjoy working with edge devices such as Nvidia Jetson Xavier and Raspberry Pi to create IoT and robot solutions through hands-on experimentation.

In the spring of 2023, as a club president of AutonoBots at UTA, I worked on robot SLAM (with rtabmap) and sensor fusion utilizing lidar, imu and camera data and participated in the National Robotics Challenge

I love cameras, math, coding, and making things work. I want to use my skills to create innovative products in robotics, AI, and computer vision. Adopting a proactive 'do it now' approach has contributed a lot to my growth and understanding of new technologies and research papers
Thank you for taking the time to learn about me and my work. If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to reach out to me.
